Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship studies of ultra-short peptides with potent activities against fluconazole-resistant Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Ng SMS, Yap JM, Ng FM, Ong EHQ, Barkham T, Teo JWP, Alfatah M, Kong KW, Hoon S, Arumugam P, Hill J, Brian Chia CS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 64550 (MIC=1.56µM),Candida albicans ATCC MYA-573(MIC=3.13µM),Candida albicans ATCC 64124(MIC=3.13µM),Candida albicans ATCC 96901(MIC=1.56µM),Candida albicans ATCC 200955(MIC=1.56µM),Candida albicans NUH-K 6004(MIC=1.56µM),Candida albicans TTSH-CALB01(MIC=1.56µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae BY4743(MIC=5.75µM)
